text: 2|174|allāhu avatarippicca, vēdagranthattiluḷḷa kāryaṅṅaḷ maṟaccuvekkukayuṁ, atinnu vilayāyi tucchamāya nēṭṭaṅṅaḷ nēṭiyeṭukkukayuṁ ceyyunnavarārēā avar taṅṅaḷuṭe vayaṟukaḷil tinnu niṟakkunnat narakāgniyallāte maṟṟeānnumalla. uyirtteḻunnēlpinṟe nāḷil allāhu avarēāṭ sansārikkukayēā (pāpaṅṅaḷil ninn‌) avare sanśud'dharākkukayēā ceyyukayilla. avarkk vēdanayēṟiya śikṣayuṇṭāyirikkukayuṁ ceyyuṁ
